samples.context: It was a busy morning at the office. If it was Monday, then there would be a staff meeting. If they finished the report, then they could submit it to their manager. They were certain that either it was Monday, or they did not submit the report. It is known at the office that if someone is a good employee, they finish their reports on time.
samples.question: If there was no staff meeting, is Sam a good employee?

samples.context: It is a hard decision to decide what to cook for dinner. They knew that if they had all the right ingredients, then it would be an elaborate meal. If they try a complicated recipe, that means they went grocery shopping recently. They were sure that either they had all the ingredients, or they did not go shopping recently, or they had the ingredients and did not go shopping recently. It's obvious that if someone is an adventurous cook, they would try a complicated recipe.
samples.question: If it is not an elaborate meal, is Sam an adventurous cook?

samples.context: It was a cold winter morning and someone was getting ready to go out. They knew that if it had snowed overnight, then the roads would be slippery. If they drove somewhere, then they would have to scrape the snow off their car. They were sure that either it had snowed overnight, or they did not scrape their car, or it had snowed overnight and they did not scrape their car. It's known that if someone is prepared for winter weather, they scrape the snow off their car before driving.
samples.question: If the roads were not slippery, is Ryan prepared for winter weather?

samples.context: Someone was getting ready for a road trip. They knew that if the car had gas, then they could drive long distances. If they see the sights, then they are taking a scenic route. They were certain that either the car had gas, or they were not taking the scenic route, or the car had gas and they were not taking the scenic route. It's common sense that if someone loves road trips, they take the scenic route to see the sights.
samples.question: If they cannot drive long distances, does Mike love road trips?

samples.context: It was a busy day at the office. Someone knew that if it was close to lunchtime, then their coworkers would be hungry. They also had a presentation to prepare for that afternoon. If they prepared well for the presentation, then they would be ready for the meeting. They were certain that either it was close to lunchtime, or they were not ready for the meeting, or it was close to lunchtime and they were not ready for it. Everyone at the office understood that if someone was diligent, they would prepare well for presentations.
samples.question: If John's coworkers are not hungry, is he diligent?

samples.context: It was a sunny morning and someone was deciding what to do that day. They knew that if it was not raining, then going for a hike was an option. If they took photos, then they would need to bring a camera. They were sure that either it was not raining, or they did not bring a camera. It is widely known among their friends that if someone is a nature lover, they take photos of nature.

samples.context: It was early and someone contemplated making breakfast. They knew that if they had eggs, then they could make an omelet. They also wanted to have a healthy meal to start the day. If they made an omelet, then they would be having a healthy breakfast. They were certain that either they had eggs, or they were not having a healthy breakfast, or they had eggs and were not having a healthy breakfast. Nutritionists recommend that if someone cares about eating well, they would make an omelet for breakfast.

samples.context: Someone was getting ready to go on vacation. They knew that if the weather was nice, then they could relax outside. If they read books, that means they packed enough. samples.context: It was morning and someone was getting ready for the day. They knew that if they woke up on time, then they wouldn't be rushed. If they stop for coffee, then they leave early. samples.context: It was a cold winter day. Someone knew that if the temperature dropped below freezing, then there would be snow on the ground. They wanted to build a snowman outside. samples.context: It was a clear night as someone walked outside and looked up at the sky. They knew that if the moon was full, then they would be able to see well at night.
